data.name: Beach Picnic
data.description: Relax on lovely Manly Beach, one of Australia’s most famous beaches where the first world surfing contest was held in 1964. You’ll find plenty of wonderful things to do and see, from picnics on the promenade to fun and informative tours, including surfing, snorkelling, diving, cycling and walking.

data.name: Freshie Community Garden
data.description: Freshie Community Garden seeks to create an attractive, welcome, shared and safe place to grow fruit trees, vegetables and flowers using sustainable practices, and to promote social harmony and inclusion through building community capacity.

data.name: Sunset Cinema
data.description: The warmer weather has arrived and those wonderful balmy nights are perfect for enjoying outdoor cinema. Australia’s favourite open-air cinema, Moonlight Cinema, returns for another season offering a full program of silver screen blockbusters.

data.name: Super Kids Sports
data.description: Super Kids Sports is a MULTI-SPORTS program bringing FUN and EXCITEMENT to your little super hero. The program is designed to encourage a love of sport whilst helping children learn and develop a range of sport, movement and life skills that help them FLY through life.

data.name: The Finishing Touches Exhibition
data.location: Hunter Street Gallery of Fine Arts, Paramatta
data.description: We are the only permanent Fine Arts Gallery in Parramatta, we change our display  every 7 to 8 weeks and sell our members work. We have many well-known experienced artists as well as up and coming artists.  Over the last 2 years we have gained a reputation of selling fine art to locals and visitors to Parramatta.
